result.arabic_text: وَإِذۡ قَالَ رَبُّكَ لِلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ إِنِّي خَٰلِقُۢ بَشَرٗا مِّن صَلۡصَٰلٖ مِّنۡ حَمَإٖ مَّسۡنُونٖ
result.translation: Unibuke ubwo Nyagasani wawe yabwiraga Abamalayika ati "Mu by’ukuri ngiye kurema umuntu (Adamu) mu ibumba ryumye ukomangaho rikirangira, mu ibumba ry’umukara ryahinduye ibara n’impumuro (kubera igihe ryari rimaze).”
